entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
